meanings.sent1: The story had an inconsequently jumbled plot that confused the readers.

meanings.sent1: The inconsequently small details were easily overlooked in the grand scheme of things.
meanings.sent2: His inconsequently chosen words had little impact on the overall message.
meanings.sent3: The inconsequently tiny pebble in his shoe bothered him more than expected.

meanings.sent5: The inconsequently misplaced key led to a series of frustrating events.
